recipe.title: Pumpkin Muffins
recipe.ingredients: 4 eggs, beaten 2 cups sugar 1 1/2 cups oil 1 14 oz. can pumpkin 3 cups flour 2 1/2 tsp. cinnamon 1 tsp. nutmeg 2 tsp. baking soda 2 tsp. baking powder 1 tsp. salt 2 cups raisins General Info: Preheat oven to 400 degrees
recipe.steps: Beat together eggs, sugar, oil and pumpkin Mix together all dry ingredients and stir into pumpkin mixture; stir until smooth Stir in raisins Grease a muffin tin and fill each hole 2/3 full. Bake for 15 minutes.
